author: Chelsea Stone
title: Stay home in style with 20% off select Adidas loungewear
description: If you're going to be stuck inside, you might as well look good doing it. That seems to be Adidas' philosophy, since the fan-favorite activewear retailer is taking 20% off select loungewear, now through April 6 with promo code ADIWEAR.
content:
If you're going to be stuck inside, you might as well look good doing it. That seems to be Adidas' philosophy, since the fan-favorite activewear retailer is taking 20% off select loungewear, now through April 6 with promo code ADIWEAR.
